venue.name: Hu Ke Lau Restaurant & Dinner Theatre

item.description: a joint meetup......2 groups.....join us on a South Seas journey of sight and sound....enjoy the flavors of the islands and then sit back and relax as we explore the fantasy isle....Hu Ke Lau for dinner and their famous Hawaiian Luau show....beautiful dancers,soothing music,and colorful costumes contrast with the exciting fire dance of Samoa,rythmic drums of the Fugi War dance and graceful hawaiian hula....come and enjoy!
item.how_to_find_us: Terri and I with a warm welcome

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: hawaiian show at Hu Ke Lau
